mapper.select: SELECT class_code, class_type, class_category, thumbnail_img, class_name, class_content, run_time, start_date, content_img, class_url, price, max_student FROM ( SELECT class_code, class_type, class_category, thumbnail_img, class_name, class_content, run_time, start_date, content_img, class_url, price, max_student, row_number() over(order by class_code DESC) AS rNum FROM "CLASS" ) mb WHERE class_type=1 and rNum BETWEEN #{start} and #{end} AND class_category IS NOT NULL ORDER BY class_code DESC

SELECT class_code, class_type, class_category, thumbnail_img, class_name, class_url, price FROM ( SELECT class_code, class_type, class_category, thumbnail_img, class_name, class_url, price, row_number() over(order by class_code DESC) AS rNum FROM "CLASS" WHERE class_category=#{classCategory} AND class_type=1 ) mb WHERE rNum BETWEEN #{vo.start} and #{vo.end}
SELECT class_code, class_type, class_category, thumbnail_img, class_name, class_content, run_time, start_date, content_img, class_url, price, max_student FROM "CLASS" WHERE class_type = 0
SELECT class_code, class_type, class_category, thumbnail_img, class_name, class_url, price FROM "CLASS" WHERE class_category=#{classCategory} AND class_type=0
SELECT class_code, class_type, class_category, thumbnail_img, class_name, class_url, price, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY class_code DESC) AS RANK FROM "CLASS" WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 8

SELECT class_code, class_type, class_category, thumbnail_img, class_name, class_content, run_time, start_date, content_img, class_url, price, max_student FROM "CLASS" WHERE class_code=#{classCode} AND class_type=1

SELECT class_code, class_type, class_category, thumbnail_img, class_name, class_content, run_time, start_date, content_img, class_url, price, max_student FROM "CLASS" WHERE class_code=#{classCode} AND class_type=0
